comments:
I did not have any network connection and I imported an old WAR project.  I noticed many Exceptions such as those below whenever anyone called WebArtifactEdit.getDeploymentDescriptorPath() or WebArtifactEdit.getDeploymentDescriptorResource().  It seems like this should still properly behave even when not connected to the network. 

org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl$1$DiagnosticWrappedException: java.net.NoRouteToHostException: No route to host: connect
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl.handleDemandLoadException(ResourceSetImpl.java:307)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl.demandLoadHelper(ResourceSetImpl.java:268)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl.getResource(ResourceSetImpl.java:390)
	at org.eclipse.jem.internal.util.emf.workbench.ProjectResourceSetImpl.getResource(ProjectResourceSetImpl.java:262)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.WorkbenchResourceHelper.getOrCreateResource(WorkbenchResourceHelper.java:307)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.getResource(EditModel.java:688)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.ArtifactEditModel.getResource(ArtifactEditModel.java:173)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.web.componentcore.util.WebArtifactEdit.getDeploymentDescriptorResource(WebArtifactEdit.java:347)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.web.componentcore.util.WebArtifactEdit.getDeploymentDescriptorPath(WebArtifactEdit.java:458)





Here's the web.xml that I had imported:



<!DOCTYPE web-app PUBLIC "-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.2//EN" "http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_2.dtd">
<web-app id="WebApp"> 
	<display-name>NewJSPandServletExample</display-name>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>Controller</servlet-name>
		<display-name>Controller</display-name>
		<servlet-class>com.ibm.samples.controller.Controller</servlet-class>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>Simple</param-name>
			<param-value>/Simple/Simple.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>FormInputForm</param-name>
			<param-value>/Form/FormInputForm.html</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>FormResults</param-name>
			<param-value>/Form/FormResults.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>SelectBeanInputForm</param-name>
			<param-value>/Select/SelectBeanInputForm.html</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>SelectBeanResults</param-name>
			<param-value>/Select/SelectBeanResults.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>ExpiringHTMLServlet</param-name>
			<param-value>/exphtml/ExpiringHTMLServlet</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>ExpiringInputPage</param-name>
			<param-value>/ExpHTMLServlet/ExpiringHTMLInputPage.html</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>HitCounterView</param-name>
			<param-value>/Counter/HitCounterView</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>FeedbackInputForm</param-name>
			<param-value>/Feedback/FeedbackInputForm.html</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>FeedbackInsert</param-name>
			<param-value>/Feedback/FeedbackInsert</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>FeedbackDetailsView</param-name>
			<param-value>/Feedback/FeedbackDetailsView</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>SurveyInputForm</param-name>
			<param-value>/Survey/SurveyInputForm.html</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>SurveyMasterView</param-name>
			<param-value>/Survey/SurveyMasterView</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>SurveyDetailsView</param-name>
			<param-value>/Survey/SurveyDetailsView</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>POLLInputForm</param-name>
			<param-value>/Poll/POLLInputForm</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>POLLDetailsView</param-name>
			<param-value>/Poll/POLLDetailsView</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>CreateDatabaseServlet</servlet-name>
		<display-name>Create WSSample Database</display-name>
		<description>This servlet creates the tables and populates the database to be used by the database examples</description>
		<servlet-class>com.ibm.samples.database.CreateDatabaseServlet</servlet-class>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>error_page</param-name>
			<param-value>/Database/CreateDatabaseError.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>result_page</param-name>
			<param-value>/Database/CreateDatabaseResults.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>ExpiringHTMLServlet</servlet-name>
		<display-name>Expiring HTML</display-name>
		<description>If it is before the given data this servlet sends the user to beforeDatePage. It send the uers to afterDatePage if not.</description>
		<servlet-class>com.ibm.samples.exphtmlservlet.ExpiringHTMLServlet</servlet-class>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>error-page</param-name>
			<param-value>/ExpHTMLServlet/ExpiringHTMLError.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>beforeDatePage</param-name>
			<param-value>/ExpHTMLServlet/ExpiringHTMLBeforeDatePage.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>afterDatePage</param-name>
			<param-value>/ExpHTMLServlet/ExpiringHTMLAfterDatePage.jsp</param-value>
		</init-param>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>HitCounterView</servlet-name>
		<display-name>Hit Counter View</display-name>
		<jsp-file>/Counter/Counter.jsp</jsp-file>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>FeedbackDetailsView</servlet-name>
		<display-name>FeedbackDetailsView</display-name>
		<jsp-file>/Feedback/FeedbackDetailsView.jsp</jsp-file>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>SurveyMasterView</servlet-name>
		<display-name>SurveyMasterView</display-name>
		<jsp-file>/Survey/SurveyMasterView.jsp</jsp-file>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>SurveyDetailsView</servlet-name>
		<display-name>SurveyDetailsView</display-name>
		<jsp-file>/Survey/SurveyDetailsView.jsp</jsp-file>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>POLLDetailsView</servlet-name>
		<display-name>POLLDetailsView</display-name>
		<jsp-file>/Poll/POLLDetailsView.jsp</jsp-file>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>POLL_ID</param-name>
			<param-value>1</param-value>
		</init-param>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>POLLInputForm</servlet-name>
		<display-name>POLLInputForm</display-name>
		<jsp-file>/Poll/POLLInputForm.jsp</jsp-file>
		<init-param>
			<param-name>POLL_ID</param-name>
			<param-value>1</param-value>
		</init-param>
	</servlet>
	<servlet>
		<servlet-name>LogonServlet</servlet-name>
		<display-name>LogonServlet</display-name>
		<servlet-class>com.ibm.samples.controller.LogonServlet</servlet-class>
	</servlet>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>Controller</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Controllers/SampleController</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>CreateDatabaseServlet</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/create_database/*</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>ExpiringHTMLServlet</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/exphtml/*</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>HitCounterView</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Counter/HitCounterView</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>FeedbackDetailsView</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Feedback/FeedbackDetailsView</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>SurveyMasterView</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Survey/SurveyMasterView</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>SurveyDetailsView</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Survey/SurveyDetailsView</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>POLLDetailsView</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Poll/POLLDetailsView</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>POLLInputForm</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Poll/POLLInputForm</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-mapping>
		<servlet-name>LogonServlet</servlet-name>
		<url-pattern>/Login/LogonServlet</url-pattern>
	</servlet-mapping>
	<welcome-file-list>
		<welcome-file>index.html</welcome-file>
		<welcome-file>index.htm</welcome-file>
		<welcome-file>index.jsp</welcome-file>
		<welcome-file>default.html</welcome-file>
		<welcome-file>default.htm</welcome-file>
		<welcome-file>default.jsp</welcome-file>
	</welcome-file-list>
</web-app>
